BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.description: Verify room price validation with zero value
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.precondition: System is running, room management module is accessible
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.test_steps:
1. Open room management form
2. Enter room price = 0.0
3. Attempt to save room
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.expected: System rejects zero price, shows error message "Price must be greater than zero"
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.comments: Boundary Value Analysis - Price = -1 (below boundary, invalid), Price = 0 (boundary value, invalid), Price = 0.01 (above boundary, valid) (Bảng 1: Room Price)

BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.comments: Boundary Value Analysis - Price = 1500.00 (valid - typical value within range) (Bảng 1: Room Price)

BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.description: Verify approve user operation simple path
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.precondition:
System is running, admin module is accessible, user exists
Note: User starts as "approved", test sets status to "panding" first, then approves it
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.test_steps:
1. Open admin management form
2. Test sets status to "panding" for test70@test.com
3. Search for user "test70@test.com"
4. Double-click to change status
5. Change status to "approved"
6. Verify status is updated
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.test_data: email = "test70@test.com", status initially "approved", test sets to "panding" then changes to "approved"
BOUNDARY_VALUE_ANALYSIS.comments:
Basic Path Testing - Simple path through approve user function

BRANCH_TESTING.description: Verify approve user operation simple path
BRANCH_TESTING.precondition:
System is running, admin module is accessible, user exists
Note: User starts as "approved", test sets status to "panding" first, then approves it
BRANCH_TESTING.test_steps:
1. Open admin management form
2. Test sets status to "panding" for test70@test.com
3. Search for user "test70@test.com"
4. Double-click to change status
5. Change status to "approved"
6. Verify status is updated
BRANCH_TESTING.test_data: email = "test70@test.com", status initially "approved", test sets to "panding" then changes to "approved"
BRANCH_TESTING.comments:
Basic Path Testing - Simple path through approve user function
